loans.use: To pay her son's university tuition fee

loans.name: Bushra

texts.en:
Ms Bushra is a 41-year-old married woman. She has been in the business of animal sales and milk sales for the last 15 years. The man shown in the photo is Bushra’s husband. He also assists her in selling animals in the local meat market. At the moment, she has three buffalo and two cubs. She makes enough to lead a respectable life.  

Bushra is a mother of seven children, four of whom are school going.  His elder son also helps her in her business.  She is trying hard to meet the needs of the family members. She has been associated with Kashf for four years. Now she requested a loan of Rs. 20,000 to purchase more animals such as small goats and sheep. She will look after them for resale in the local market. She wishes to spend part of her profits on the improvement of her house.

loans.use: To purchase more animals such as small goats and sheep.

loans.name: Susanna

texts.en:
Susanna lives in Mrganush village with her husband, son and daughter. Susanna's husband works at the local village hall, and her son attends school. Together with her husband, Susanna runs a farm where they keep pigs and hens, cultivate peppers, grow different types of fruit trees and keep a grape orchard. 

Susanna would like to develop her farm, for which she needs sufficient funds. In particular, she wants to purchase a polyethylene cover for her greenhouse and renovate it, which will allow her to create favorable conditions for growing peppers in the cold winter season. Susanna will also purchase fertilizer to prevent diseases, which have become common recently. In addition, Susanna wants to purchase a calf, grass for feeding it, and forage for the pigs. These investments are important for Susanna to keep running her farm successfully and gather a stable agricultural income.

loans.use: to pay for a calf, forage for pigs, grass, fertilizer, a polyethylene cover for the greenhouse and for the greenhouse renovation

loans.name: Virginia

texts.es:
Virginia, una mujer de 28 años cuyo esmero por sacar adelante a su familia nunca se vio limitada por su condición de género, junto a Palermo, fiel conviviente. Lleva un rol de madre abnegada por sus dos hijos: Kevin y Yeny. Asimismo tiene el orgullo de haber logrado la construcción de su casa a base de material noble. Con buen tiempo de labor en el campo logró reunir capital suficiente para adquirir una tienda de abarrotes, en un ambiente de su domicilio recién culminado. Teniendo como apoyo principal a sus dos menores hijos viene desempeñándose con bastante motivación ya que ha notado que su negocio tiene tendencia a crecer de tal manera que tiene pensado ampliarlo a futuro. Considera que uno de los factores que ayudan al culminar el día con buenas ganancias es el trato y confianza que ella brinda a sus clientes, pues gracias a ello a logrado hacerse muy conocida y a la vez querida en su barrio.
Dentro de los productos mas consumidos en su negocio están las conservas y menestras, adicionando a ello los productos de común uso como el arroz, azúcar, huevos, etc. Para ello viene recibiendo ofertas por parte de sus proveedores quienes por la compra al por mayor incluyen un descuento especial, pues desea aprovecharlos y así lograr obtener ganancias  extras en su negocio. Este es su préstamo número 14, como siempre considera que el cumplimiento de sus pagos le esta permitiendo obtener mas confianza el cual le permita a futuro acceder a un crédito mayor para remodelar su negocio. Con los 1,000 nuevos soles realizará la compra de productos cuya oferta de precios es  ofrecida por parte de sus proveedores dentro de las cuales están las conservas y los productos mas comerciales como el arroz y el azúcar.
texts.en:
Virginia, a 28-year-old woman whose concern for getting her family ahead was never limited by her gender, lives together with Palermo, her faithful cohabitant. 

She plays the role of mother sacrificing herself for her two children: Kevin and Yeny. She is also proud of having built her own house with good materials. With a good amount of time working in the countryside she was able to collect sufficient capital to acquire a grocery store, started within the environment of her recently completed home.

Having her two young children as her principal support, she has performed with much motivation and she has noticed that her business has a tendency to grow in such a way that she has thought of expanding it in the future.

One of the factors that she believes helped her end the day with good profits is the treatment and reliability she offers her clients, since thanks to that she has been able to become very well-known and liked in her neighborhood.

Among the most consumed products in her business are the preserves and stews, adding to that commonly used products such as rice, sugar, eggs, etc. She has received offers from suppliers who include a special discount for bulk purchases, so she wishes to take advantage of them and thus obtain extra profits for her business.

This is her 14th loan. As always, she believes that the fulfillment of her payments is allowing her to obtain more trust which in the future will give her access to a larger loan to be used to remodel her business. With the 1,000 nuevos soles requested, she will purchase products whose sale price is being offered by her suppliers, among which are preserves and more commercial products such as rice and sugar.

loans.use: to buy preserves, rice and sugar

loans.name: Odonchimeg

texts.en: Mrs. Odonchimeg is a 29-year-old woman living with her husband and two children in a small house in the Selenge province of Mongolia. Her husband works at a rental counter in the local market. She is starting a grocery store business now. She found a place to rent that is a top location for a grocery store. She has estimated her approximate monthly income. It will be enough for family use and she is planning to save the excess income for their daughters' future education costs. She needs a 3,800,000 MNT loan to purchase inventory for her newly starting grocery store business. She is a hardworking, open-minded and friendly woman whose dream is to educate her daughters at good universities and let them be better people.

loans.use: To purchase inventory for her grocery store

loans.name: Shazia

texts.en:
Ms. Shazia is a 32-year-old married woman. She has been running a beauty parlor for the last six years. She serves her community well by offering great services to her customers. She knows the techniques of makeup very well. With the passage of time, she has become famous for bridal make up. She also facilitates her customers by offering jewelry items and other accessories. She is happily doing this for the sake of her family. 

She is a mother of three and believes in the proper, formal education of her children. That’s why her two children are school going. In order to serve more customers at a time, she needs to purchase more packs of skin care products, blow dryers, rollers and makeup kits. For this reason, she requested a loan of Rs 15,000 to meet the requirements of her beauty parlor. She is hopeful of getting an increase in her net income and intends to use part of her profits on the improvement of her house and parlor.

loans.use: To purchase more packs of skin care products, blow dryers, rollers and makeup kits.

loans.name: Azran

texts.en:
Azran is a 30-year-old married woman and a mother of two. She started in the business of cloths trade one year ago. 

She serves her community well by providing good quality fabrics. She offers cloths of different colors, according to the tastes and choices of her customers. 

Azran is contributing much of the family income to support the needs of her family members. Her husband is a laborer whose income alone is not sufficient to bear everyday expenditures. 

Azran wishes to send her children to school but is unable to cover the expenses. To increase her sales, she needs to purchase more variety of cloths for the winter season. 

She has requested for a loan of 25,000 Pakistani rupees, which will enable her to offer more range to her customers. She intends to use part of her profits to provide quality education for her children.

loans.use: To purchase more variety of cloths for the winter season.

loans.name: Sausten

texts.en:
Meet 56-year-old Sausten. He was recently widowed and has seven children. He runs a restaurant and a mobile money transfer shop in Petauke, a town located in the Eastern part of Zambia. 

Sausten started running his own business after his retirement 10 years ago. When he first started, business was good as there was not much competition, but with the arrival of bigger eating places, his business became slow. It is for this reason that, in 2009, he signed up to become a mobile money transfer agent. Offering the service of sending and receiving money in his restaurant gave him the foot traffic that he needed to keep his shop open.  

He says his major challenge is low working capital. He constantly has to go to the bank so that he can satisfy his customers. Furthermore, his restaurant has no electricity. This, he says, is a major disadvantage for him because he cannot serve his customers cold drinks.

Sausten needs the Kiva loan so that he can increase his working capital. This will enable him to earn more commissions from his mobile money transfer business so that he can connect electricity for his restaurant shop.

Sausten thanks the Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To increase his float for money transfers

loans.name: Lydia

texts.en:
Lydia used her previous loan to buy more stock of vegetables and charcoal for sale and the business is doing great.

This is her second loan cycle from KADET LTD, She will use the loan amount to purchase more stock of charcoal and assorted fruits and vegetables for resale so that she can meet the demands of her customers who are mostly residents of Nakuru town.

She hopes to grow her business and use the anticipated profit to build a permanent structure where she can operate her business.

loans.use: to purchase more charcoal and vegetables for resale.

loans.name: Geraldine Dayanna

texts.es:
Geraldine es una joven de 19 años, estudiante de Geomántica en un Instituto local.
 Geraldine estudia esta carrera porque es innovadora y muy requerida en el mercado empresarial, además las posibilidades de trabajo son muchas para ella, la duración de sus estudios  es de 03 años, solo le faltan algunos meses para culminar su carrera con éxito. Geraldine es muy aplicada con sus estudios y comparte su horario con el trabajo en una empresa del rubro, con el dinero de su préstamo  podrá gestionar  su titulo como técnico profesional, su mayor deseo es seguir  seguir avanzando con sus estudios;   hasta lograr un puesto en alguna empresa importante, está feliz y agradecida a EDAPROSPO y a Instituciones como KIVA por el apoyo que le brindan.
texts.en:
Geraldine is a young,19-year-old woman who is a Geomatics student in a local Institute. Geraldine is studying for this profession because it is innovative and highly demanded in the business market and moreover, the possibilities for work for her will be many.  The total duration of her studies is three years, and she only has a few months left before she will successfully complete her degree.

Geraldine is very applied in her studies and she splits school her schedule with her work at a related business. With the money from her loan she will be able to arrange her title as a technical professional. Her biggest wish is to be able to continue on with her studies. Until she achieves a position in an important business, she is happy and grateful to EDAPROSPO and institutions such as Kiva for the support they offer.

loans.use: to arrange her title as a technical professional

loans.name: Naila

texts.en: Ms. Naila is 30 years old. She lives in a one-bedroom house with her husband and daughter. When her husband failed to find employment, Naila decided to use the skill her mother taught her at a very young age and earn something for her family. She started stitching for females in the neighborhood. She plans to buy a new stitching machine and raw materials such as reels of threads, buttons etc., so she can meet the growing needs of her customers. That is why she has applied for a loan of Rs.15,000 in Kashf Foundation. Naila is passionate about her work and informed the Kashf officer that she is planning to prepare fancy dresses so she can sell them to retailers in the city of Lahore.

loans.use: To purchase a new sewing machine, threads, buttons etc

loans.name: Gohar

texts.en: Gohar lives in Yeghvard village in the Syunik region with her husband and 15-year-old daughter. Gohar works as a teacher at the local school and her husband works at the post office. Gohar and her husband are also involved in cattle breeding to earn more income and to make ends meet. Currently, the number of livestock on their farm is seven. Gohar would like to start pig breeding, too, for which she needs some investment. With the help of this loan, Gohar plans to purchase three pigs as well as wheat to feed the livestock. This will allow Gohar to earn additional income from the sales of meat and continue further expansion of her farm.

loans.use: to buy three pigs and wheat to feed the livestock

loans.name: Jorge Julian

texts.es:
Jorge de 23 años estudia la carrera de Computación e Informática en un Instituto local
Jorge trabaja en una empresa como asistente de almacén, eligió estudiar esta carrera porque en la empresa donde  labora actualmente hay muchas oportunidades de trabajo para él, sus estudios tienen una duración de 3 años y le falta la mitad para terminar, el préstamo que ha solicitado lo utilizara para pagar las mensualidades de un ciclo en su Instituto. Jorge desea convertirse en un profesional de éxito para poder ayudar a su familia y mejorar como persona, agradece el apoyo de instituciones como KIVA y considera que es muy importante debido a que muchos jóvenes dejan de estudiar por la falta de dinero, por eso valora la ayuda a jóvenes como el.
texts.en: Jorge is 23 years old and he is studying the major of computers and information at a local institute. Jorge works at a business as a store assistant. He chose to study this major because in the business where he works  now there are many opportunities for this type of work. His studies will last for three years and he needs to complete the second half to finish. He will use the loan he has sought to pay the monthly fees for a term at his institute. Jorge wishes to become a successful professional so that he can help his family and improve himself as a person. He is thankful for the support of institutions like Kiva and he thinks that it is very important because many young people stop studying because of a lack of money. Because of this he values the help to young people like him.

loans.use: to pay the monthly fees for his studies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for coffee cutters

loans.name: Shairkul

texts.ru:
Шайыркул 53 лет, замужем, имеет одного сына на иждивение. В качестве источника дохода для семьи, Шайыркул является животноводство. Начав этот бизнес с 1,000 KGS, Шайыркул смогла развить хозяйство с ежемесячным доходом в 3,000 сом (KGS).По своему характеру человек очень жизнерадостный старательный. По хозяйству ей помогает муж и сын, в свободное от школы время.  В целях дальнейшего увеличения поголовья скота, Шайыркул обратилась в компанию «Бай Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота. Доходы от кредита Шайыркул планирует вложить в увеличение поголовья, что позволит ей увеличить свое хозяйство. 
НА следующий год Шайыркул планирует купить мебель для дома.
texts.en:
Shairkul is 53 years old, married, and has one son who is dependent on her. As a source of income for her family, Shairkul practices animal husbandry. Starting this business with 1000 Kyrgyz som, Shairkul managed to develop her business to earn a monthly income of 3000 som (KGS). By nature, she is a very cheerful, hardworking person. Her son, during his free time from school, and her husband help her in her practice. 

For the purposes of further increasing the numbers of her livestock, Shairkul turned to the Bai Tushum and Partners Company for a loan in the amount of 50,000 som (KGS) for the purchase of cattle. Shairkul plans to invest the income from this loan to increase her livestock population, which will allow her to increase her husbandry enterprise. Next year, Shairkul plans to buy furniture for her home.

loans.use: To purchase livestock

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy coffee plants for her plantation

loans.name: Alejandro

texts.es: Alejandro trabaja como vigilante en un beneficio de café y en sus tiempos libres se dedica a producir café. Su esposa Daysi lo ayuda con estas labores, aunque también se tiene que encargar del hogar pues tienen 2 hijos pequeños. El café que Alejandro produce es convencional y entrega la totalidad de su producción a la “Unión Regional de Huatusco” para que sea procesado y exportado. Para la siguiente cosecha a Alejandro necesita un crédito para pagar a los trabajadores que cortaran su café y al final de la cosecha pagará el crédito con las ganancias que obtenga. A él le gustaría poder sembrar más planta de café para que dentro de unos años pueda aumentar su producción y también sus ingresos. La mayor meta que Alejandro y su esposa tienen es poder brindar a sus hijos la oportunidad de estudiar una carrera universitaria para que en el futuro tengan mejores opciones de empleo.
texts.en:
Alejandro works as a security guard at a coffee processing plant, and in his free time he also produces coffee.  His wife, Daysi, helps him with this work, although she also has to take care of the home as they have 2 small children.  The coffee that Alejandro produces is grown using conventional (rather than organic) methods, and he delivers all of his production to the La Union Regional de Huatusco coffee cooperative so that it can be processed and exported.  

For the next harvest, Alejandro needs a loan to pay the workers who will harvest his coffee.  At the end of the harvest, he will pay off the loan with the profits he obtains.  He would like to be able to plant more coffee so that within  few years he could increase his production and also his income.  

The main goal of Alejandro and his wife is to be able to provide their children with the opportunity to study for a university degree, so that in the future they will have better job opportunities.

loans.use: to pay workers to harvest his coffee

loans.name: Sophia

texts.en:
Sophia is a widow aged 45 years. She is blessed with two children aged 22 and 18 years. Sophia makes cultural outfits using traditional fabric and beads for embroidery. Sophia has been running the business for ten years, earning a monthly income of KES 16,000.

She has borrowed a second loan of KES 30,000 from KADET LTD, the entire amount of which she intends to use to purchase more beads for embroidery. The anticipated profit will be used for marketing her cultural wear within Narok town.

Her dreams are to improve her living standard and to own a residential plot.

loans.use: to buy beads for embroidery

loans.name: Irshad

texts.en:
Ms. Irshad is an active 50-year-old woman. She and her husband have been in the milking business for twenty years now. They possess the required skill and knowledge to conduct this business on a large scale but have limited resources. When Kashf’s loan officer found her, she was living in an old shabby house with her nine children and one buffalo. Life was extremely challenging for this family, living from hand to mouth. Her husband is a laborer in a community school, and one of her five sons works at a local store.

Over this year, Irshad was able to meet more orders than ever. She is not only supplying milk in her neighborhood but has become a permanent supplier to a milk shop in the local market. She is now saving in anticipation of future business expansion. Recently she approached Kashf once again to request a loan of PKR 35,000. Talking to Kashf’s loan officer, she said that she will expand this business by purchasing another buffalo, and will thereby be able to provide her children with a standard of life she only dreamed of herself.

loans.use: To buy another buffalo.

loans.name: Gulniza

texts.ru:
Гульниза 24 года, не замужем. Образование средне специальное. Живет вместе с сестренкой в собственной кваритире. Родители уехали в Россию на заработки. Долгие годы она живет с сестренкой. Сестренка учиться в Средней школе. Ей цель жизни, это улучшить жизненные условия, Обучить сестренку в хорошем университете и конечно же расширить бизнес. Гульниза очень добрая, общительная, умная и шустрая девочка.
Гульниза начала свой бизнес 3 года назад начальная сумма вклада составляла 85,000 KGS. Сегодня Товарооборот Гулизы составляет 150,000 KGS. На местном рынке Гульниза занимается реализацией мужской одежду.  Дополнительно Гульниза работает медсестрой в городской больнице 
В целях дальнейшего расширения своего бизнеса, она обратилась в Компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 60,000 сом (KGS) на увеличение товарооборота за счет покупки зимнего ассортимента утепленных вещей. 
На доход полученный от кредита она хочет помочь родителям.
texts.en:
Gulniza is 24 years old and unmarried. She has a secondary, specialized education. She lives with her little sister in their own apartment. Her parents left to work in Russia. She has lived for many years with her little sister. Her little sister studies at secondary school. Her purpose in life is to improve her living conditions, get her little sister an education at a good university and, of course, expand her business. Gulniza is a very kind, gregarious, intelligent and sharp young woman. 

Gulniza started her business three years ago with an initial investment of 85,000 KGS. Today, Gulniza's retail business totals 150,000 KGS. In the marketplace, Gulniza sells men's clothing. Additionally, Gulniza works as a nurse in the city hospital. 

For the purpose of expanding her business, she reached out to the Bai Tushum and Partners Company for a loan in the amount of 60,000 som (KGS). This loan is for the expansion of her retail business through the purchase of a winter assortment of insulated clothes. With the income received from the loan, she wants to help her parents.

loans.use: To expand her business

loans.name: Juan

texts.es: Durante más de la mitad de su vida Juan ha sido productor de café. Desde pequeño acompañaba a su padre a trabajar en las fincas de café de la familia y con el tiempo fue adquiriendo la experiencia necesaria para poder producir su propio café. Él está casado con Alma con quien tiene dos hijos pequeños. Además de dedicarse al café Juan también tiene un taxi y es allí donde trabaja la mayor parte del tiempo. Durante la época de cosecha contrata cortadores para que le ayuden en el trabajo en su finca. Para la siguiente cosecha Juan quiere sembrar un terreno que adquirió hace poco y para eso necesita de un crédito el cual pagará al final de la cosecha. Terminando la cosecha a Juan le gustaría hacerle algunas mejoras a su casa con las ganancias que obtenga para poder dar mayores comodidades a su esposa  y a sus dos hijos pequeños.
texts.en:
For more than half his life, Juan has been a coffee producer. Since he was little he has accompanied his father to work on the family's coffee farms and with time he acquired the experience necessary to be able to produce his own coffee.

He is married to Alma, with whom he has two small children. Beyond coffee production, Juan also has a taxi and that is where he works the majority of the time. During the harvest time he hires trimmers to help him with the work on his farm.

For the next harvest Juan wants to plant on some recently acquired land and for that he needs a loan which he will pay back at the end of the harvest.

When he finishes the harvest, Juan would like to make some improvements to his house with the income that he obtains so that he can provide more comforts to his wife and two young children.

loans.use: to sow coffee plants

loans.name: Faina Del Carmen

texts.es:
Faina tiene 39 años de edad, es casada y tiene tres hijos. Ella desde muy joven se ha dedicado a vender en su tienda, y también destaza animales vendiendo la carne de estos, su madre le heredo este oficio. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para construir dos habitaciones a su casa y para reparar una galera. De esta manera sus hijos que son unos adolescentes podrán tener su propio espacio y vivir cómodamente. Su objetivo es amueblar esas habitaciones y poderles ayudar a sus hijos para que sean personas de bien y profesionales.
texts.en:
Faina is 39 years old, is married and has three children. She has been selling in her store since very young. She quarters animals and sells the meat. She inherited this profession from her mother.

The loan she is requesting to Fundación Campo is to build two rooms in her house and to repair a galley. This way, her children who are teenagers can have their own space and live comfortably. Her goal is to furnish these rooms and be able to help her children to be good people and professionals.

loans.use: to build two rooms in her house and to repair a galley.

loans.name: Geancarlo Bladimir

texts.es: Geancarlo tiene 22 años de edad vive en la ciudad de Quevedo, es soltero. Su padre le enseño el negocio familiar que es la distribución de pomas de aguas. En la actualidad en su carro sale a distribuir sus pomas de aguas a todos los barrios de su ciudad. El trabaja solo de lunes a viernes desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 6 de la tarde. Su mayor miedo es la delincuencia que vive el país, el teme que le roben las pomas de aguas. Con el préstamo quiere comprar pomas de aguas y arreglar el local. Su sueño es tener un local grande donde distribuya las pomas de aguas.
texts.en: Geancario is 22 years old, single and lives in Quvedo City. His father taught him the family business, which is delivery of bottled water. Each day he uses his car to deliver water to the neighborhoods in the city. He works from Monday to Friday from 8am until 6pm. His greatest fear is the crime in his country. He fears that he will be robbed of his water bottles. With this loan he will buy water bottles and fix up the place where he sells them. His dream is to have a large distribution center for his water bottles.

loans.use: to buy water bottles and fix up the place where he sells them.

loans.name: Eulalia Marina

texts.es: Eulalia vive en el suburbio de la ciudad Guayaquil.Tiene 32 años de edad está casada tiene 3 hijos el mayor de 7 años  el otro de 6años y el menor de 4 años de edad todos asisten a una escuela publica cerca de su casa. Su esposo trabaja como comerciante de ropa. Ella empezó hace 6 años atrás con la ilusión de ponerse una peluquería y en la actualidad lo consiguió porque ahora dio la apertura de su peluquería,cuenta con una maquina de cortar cabello. Eulalia atiende su negocio de lunes a domingo de 9 de la mañana hasta la 10 de la noche con el pasar del tiempo ha ido incrementando día a día su clientela. Con el préstamo ella quiere comprar herramientas, maquina de cortar cabello, tintes etc. Su mayor sueño es tener una peluquería en otro sector y así poder tener mas sucursales.
texts.en: Eulalia lives in a suburb of the city of Guayaquil. She is 32 years old, married and has three children. The oldest is 7 years old, the middle one is 6 and the youngest is 4. All of her children go to a public school close to her house. Her husband sells clothes for a living. For the past six years she has wanted to open a hairdressing shop and she has just reached this goal by opening this shop. She has a shaver for cutting hair. Eulalia works from Monday to Sunday, from 9 in the morning until 10 at night. As time goes on, she has increased her customer base. With this loan she will buy equipment such as shavers, dyes, etc. Her greatest dream is to have a hair salon in another area. Then she will have more franchises.

loans.use: tools such as a shaver, hair dyes, etc.

loans.name: Nadira

texts.ru: Надира 24 года, не замужем.Надира закончила местную школу. У Надиры есть замечательная двух летняя дочка Салиха. Ее цель в жизни, это улучшить жизненные условия, обучить дочку в хорошей школе, затем и в университете и конечно же расширить бизнес. Надира очень добрая, общительная, умная и шустрая Девушка. Надира начала свой бизнес 2 года назад начальная сумма вклада составляла 80,000 KGS. Сегодня Товарооборот Надиры составляет 150,000 KGS. На местном рынке Надира занимается реализацией женской одежды.В ведение бизнеса Надире помогает ее младший брат.  В целях дальнейшего расширения своего бизнеса, она обратилась в Компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 135,000 сом (KGS) на увеличение товарооборота за счет покупки зимнего ассортимента утепленных вещей. Цель в жизни Надиры вырастить и воспитать дочку.
texts.en:
Nadira is 24 years old, unmarried, and she graduated from a local school.  She has a beautiful 2-year-old daughter named Salikha.  Nadira's goal in life is to improve her living conditions, send her daughter to a good school and one day to university, and, of course, to expand her business.

Nadira is a very kind, sociable, intelligent and sharp young woman.  She started her own business two years ago with an initial investment of 80,000 som (KGS).  Today, her product turnover brings her 150,000 som KGS.  

Nadira sells women's clothing at the local market.  Her younger brother helps her to run the business.

In order to further expand her business, she has turned to "Bai Tushum & Partners" for a loan of 135,000 som (KGS).  She wants to buy a range of insulated winter clothes, which will help her to increase her product turnover.  Her goal in life is to raise and educate her daughter.

loans.use: To buy winter clothes for resale

loans.name: Jose Luis

texts.es: El Sr. José Luis tiene la edad de 39 años es casado y no tiene ningún hijo es un Sr. muy trabajador y emprendedor ya que cuenta con un pequeño carro que lo utiliza como taxi desde hace 2 años que se dedica a este oficio y actualmente esta solicitando la ayuda a esta institución para establecer en su hogar un pequeño puesto de lonchería y taqueria y así ofrecerle una mejor vida a su esposa desea contar con el apoyo de kiva.
texts.en: Mr. José Luis is 39 years old, married and doesn’t have children. He is a hardworking and enterprising man. He has a small car that he has used as a taxi for the past two years. He is actually asking for this loan to start a small luncheonette and taqueria in his home. He would like to improve the life of his wife with the support of KIVA.

loans.use: to start a business in his home.

loans.name: Marlyn Del Carmen

texts.es:
Marlyn tiene 32 años de edad, es madre de un hijo. Ella se ha dedicado a elaborar tamales y venta de plantas en su vivero, lo aprendió de su madre que siempre ha trabajado en eso. Viaja unos diez kilómetros hasta la ciudad a adquirir los insumos para elaborar los tamales. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar cinco bovinos para engordarlos. Con la inversión obtendrá un ingreso extra para brindarle a su hijo  todo lo que necesita, como lo es el estudio ya que ella desea que su hijo estudie una carrera universitaria.
texts.en:
Marlyn is 32 years old and the mother of one child. She makes tamales and also sells plants from her garden. She learned this job from her mother, who always did this type of work. She travels about ten kilometers to the city to buy the supplies necessary to make her tamales.
This loan, which she is requesting from Fundación Campo, is to buy five calves to fatten up. With this work she will have extra money to use to support her child with what he needs. She wants her child to study and eventually study a career in the university.

loans.use: to buy five calves to fatten up.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy traditional clothes and to buy corn for making tortillas. P

loans.name: Shamus

texts.en:
Ms Shamas is a 39-year-old married woman; she has been in the tailoring business for six years. She has three children; one of her daughters assists her mother in her stitching work. Shamas started from stitching bed sheets. In her initial days she worked with one machine only but now she has a set of machines. 

Six years ago she joined Kashf Foundation and from there on, she never turned back. She is a very hardworking lady and has future plans to make a training center for ladies and become a successful entrepreneur. She recently applied for a loan of PKR 45,000 to purchase more reels of thread and packs of laces and buttons in different colors to meet the orders on time. 

Her husband is a railway employee, and he praises his wife’s success and wishes her good luck for the future because without her assistance, he could not provide health, education and other facilities to his family.

loans.use: to purchase more reels of thread and packs of laces and buttons in different colors.

loans.name: Susan

texts.en:
Susan is a married lady aged 50 years old. She is blessed with four children who are all adult aged. She operates a green grocery in Lower Melili area and has been running the business for 15 years, earning a monthly income of KES 40,000.

She has borrowed a second loan of KES 60,000 from KADET LTD, which she intends to purchase more fruits and vegetables for the business. 

The anticipated profit will be used to pay college fees for her last born child. Her dreams are to improve her living standards and to own her residential plot.

loans.use: to purchase fruits and vegetables for resale.

loans.name: Suriya

texts.en:
Ms Suriya is a 51-year-old, married woman. When Kashf’s loan officer found Suriya, she was living in an old, shabby house with limited basic necessities and no source of income. Her husband was jobless and frustrated, her children were not going to school, and life seemed almost hopeless.

A loan from the foundation helped them renew their clothing business, which had almost died. Every day Suriya sets out in the marketplace, hoping to take as many orders as possible. She has recently requested a loan of 35,000 PKR, to purchase a greater variety of clothes for the winter season. She says life has never been like this before. Her children are going to school, and next year her daughter will appear in the board exams. Her husband is saving so he may get his house renovated next year.

loans.use: To purchase a greater variety of clothes for winter season.

loans.name: Aram

texts.en: Aram is a young farmer who lives with his 53-year-old father and 50-year-old mother. Aram works as an accountant and is the only breadwinner in the family. Besides his accounting work, Aram also helps his parents with agriculture. They raise cows, lambs, and keep ten colonies of bees. Although Aram is only 23 years old he has many plans for future. He wants to increase the number of livestock, for which he needs some capital. With the requested loan he plans to purchase ten beehives and two cows. Aram dreams of founding a big farm, and this loan will create a good base from which he may make his dream come true.

loans.use: to pay for two cows and ten beehives

loans.name: Panin

texts.en:
Panin is a 29-year-old, single gentleman, who supports his siblings. He is a livestock trader and has been running the business for the past seven years, making a monthly income of 20,000 Kenyan shillings.

He has borrowed the amount of 30,000 KES, his seventh loan from KADET LTD, with which he intends to purchase more livestock for fattening and resale. The anticipated profit from using the loan will be reinvested to boost business further. His future dream is to improve his living standard.

loans.use: to buy livestock for fattening and resale.

loans.name: Refugio

texts.es:
El señor Refugio es casa y tiene tres hijos dos estudian la primaria y la mayor la secundaria, desea darles los estudios necesario para que tengan un futuro emprendedor.
Esta solicitando un préstamo para comprar el material que necesita para la elaboración de la barda alrededor de su vivienda y necesita comprar block, cemento, varilla y arena, quien se encargara de realizar la mejora será el mismo en haría adicional a su empleo.
El señor Refugio trabaja en una compañía de construcción desde hace mas de 5 añas, con una parte del suelda que recibe será para pagar el crédito.
Desea aumentar el valor de su patrimonio, tener una mayor protección y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Refugio is married and has three children. The youngest two are studying at primary school while the eldest attends secondary school. Refugio wants to provide them with the necessary education to achieve an enterprising future. 

Refugio is requesting this loan in order to purchase the materials he requires to build a fence around their home, such as bricks, cement, poles and sand.  He will carry out this improvement himself, alongside his day job. Refugio has worked for a construction company for more than five years, and will repay the loan from his salary. He wants to increase the value of his land, improve the security of his home and give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to build a fence around his home.

loans.name: Tsedendamba

texts.en: Mr.Tsedendamba is 33 years old and lives with his wife and three children in Uvs province, Mongolia. He has been working as a construction assistant for several years. His wife has worked at a private tailoring company for three consecutive years. He is planning to start a business, offering taxi service, after a seasonal construction job of his finishes in early November. He is planning to purchase an eco-friendly and economical hybrid car for his business. He is requesting 2,500,000 MNT to purchase an eco-friendly, economical hybrid car, to use for his business providing taxi service. He's a very pleasant, hard-working, and enthusiastic person.

loans.use: to purchase an eco-friendly, economical hybrid car to use for his taxi service business

loans.name: Sarantsetseg

texts.en:
Mrs. Sarantsetseg is 35 years old and lives with her husband, two sons and her mother in Ger in Arhangai province, Mongolia. Her husband, Damdinsuren, works at a construction site. Her sons, Enhamgalan and Baatar, ages 8 and 5 years old, go to secondary school and kindergarten. She has been working at a small cafe since 2009. She is planning to open her own small cafe and found the place to rent and estimated the potential income which can be enough to cover family expenses. 

Mrs. Sarantsetseg has gained a lot of experience and customers' trust while working at the cafe. She is planning to reserve meat and vegetables now, which is at the cheapest price of the year, for winter use in the cafe. She a hardworking and honest person. She is asking for 500,000 MNT to purchase meat and vegetables for her newly starting business.

loans.use: to purchase meat and vegetables for her newly starting business.

loans.name: Phat's Group

texts.en:
A diligent farmer residing in the Srey Snom district of Siem Reap Province, Phat overcomes her financial burden through two-hectares of rice farming. This is her main source of her income. She has engaged in this business for five years. 

In the group of three, Phat and one of her co-members are third-cycle loan borrowers and her remaining co-member has just joined VisionFund (Kiva's partner) for this cycle. She has managed her loan in smart manner in order to relieve her family's burden and improve its livelihood. This cycle, she is the leader and her loan portion will be spent on purchasing fertilizer and rice-seed for her rice cultivation, and to buy pigs for raising in order to make additional  income. She hopes both of her businesses will become prosperous, so she can progressively improve her lifestyle.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and pigs

location.town: Siem Reap Province, Srey Snom district

loans.name: Gladys Rosario

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal La Negrita se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.

En este lugar vive la señora Gladyz, tiene 45 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen 4  hijos, tres de ellos son mayores de edad, la menor tiene 13 años de edad y  estudia en un colegio de la localidad, la menor aun vive con ella. Su esposo es chofer.
 
Doña Gladys hace varios años estudio corte y confección por la cual obtuvo un titulo de artesana en esta rama, con la finalidad de obtener sus propios ingresos y aprovechando sus conocimientos en corte y confección puso en su casa un pequeño taller de costura, allí ella se dedica a confeccionar todo tipo de ropa para damas, caballeros y niños, aunque reconoce que lo que más le gusta elaborar es ropa de mujer o de niñas, allí también tiene una confitería en donde vende todo tipo de caramelos y dulces, trabaja a base de pedidos de personas particulares, aunque en temporadas también elabora uniformes para instituciones, escuelas y colegios de la localidad. Trabaja todos los días desde las 6h00 hasta las 22h00 y a veces hasta más tarde cuando tiene pedidos que entregar.

Este nuevo crédito lo va utilizar en comprar caramelos, telas y otros materiales para la costura. Es fundadora del grupo y le gusta por la ayuda que recibe con los créditos.
 
Su sueño es darles lo mejor a su hija menor.
texts.en:
The communal bank “La Negrita” meets every fifteen days in the Montecristi Canton, which is known for its rich pre-colonial culture and for its handicrafts, which are recognized nationally and internationally. It is the home of the famous Panama hat. 

This is where Gladys lives. She is 45, married, and has four children with her husband. Three of the children are grown, and the youngest is 13 years old and studies in a local secondary school. The youngest daughter lives at home. Her husband is a chauffeur. 

Several years ago, Gladys studied dressmaking and earned an artisan’s certificate in this field. She installed a small dressmaker’s workshop in her home with the goal of having her own income and taking advantage of her dressmaking knowledge.  There she makes all kinds of clothes for women, men, and children. She recognizes that what she likes best is to make clothes for women or children, but she also has a candy store where she sells all kinds of candies and sweets. She works based on individual requests, although in periods she’ll make uniforms for institutions, elementary and secondary schools in the area. She works every day from 6 in the morning until 10 at night, and sometimes later when she has orders to finish. 

This new loan will be used to purchase candies, fabrics, and other materials to make clothing. She is the founder of the group, which she likes because of the support she receives with the loans. 

Her dream is to give the best to her youngest daughter.

loans.use: purchase candies, fabric, and other materials for sewing

loans.name: María Sarita

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal La Negrita se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.

En este lugar vive la señora María, tiene 50 años de edad, hace varios años su esposo falleció pero de esa relación tuvo 4  hijos todos mayores de edad, pero aun viven con ella a pesar de que ya están comprometidos.

Doña María para poder salir adelante y para cubrir los gastos del hogar ya que esta sola sin el respaldo de su marido hace varios años empezó un negocio, tiene un pequeño restaurante en su casa en el cual prepara deliciosos platos, trabaja todos los días todo el día ya que prepara desayunos, almuerzos y meriendas, con ella  trabaja una persona a quien le paga un sueldo semanal por su trabajo. Tiene 6 años con su restaurante y  siempre le ha ido muy bien ya que sus clientes la prefieren por la sazón que le pone a sus platos.

Este crédito lo va utilizar en comprar arroz, carne, pescado y otros víveres para la preparación de los alimentos. Está en el Banco Comunal desde el inicio  y le gusta porque con los créditos ha podido salir adelante. 

Su meta es seguir adelante en su negocio.
texts.en:
The communal bank “La Negrita,” meets every fifteen days in the Montecristi Canton, an area known for its rich pre-colonial culture and for its handicrafts that are nationally and internationally recognized. It is the home of the famous Panama hat. 

This is where Maria lives. She is 50 years old. It’s been several years since her husband passed away, but she has 4 children from this marriage. They are all grown, but they still live with her in spite of the fact that they are already engaged. 

Several years ago Maria opened a small restaurant in her home in order to get ahead and to cover the household expenses, since she is alone without the support of her husband. She makes delicious dishes, and she works every day, all day since she makes breakfast, lunch, and afternoon snacks. She has an employee that works with her that she pays weekly for their work. She has had this restaurant for 6 years and it has gone well for her since her clients prefer her because of the way she flavors the foods.  

She will use this loan to purchase rice, meat, fish, and other staples to prepare the food. She has been with the communal bank since the beginning, and she likes it because the loans have allowed her to advance forward. 

Her goal is to move forward with her business.

loans.use: purchase rice, meat, fish, and other staples.

loans.name: Norma Yanina

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal La Negrita se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.

En este lugar vive la señora Norma, tiene 20 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene tres hijos de 4, 3 y 2 años de edad. El marido es maestro.
 
Ella es una ama de casa que para obtener sus propios recursos y con esto poder sentirse útil y ayudar a  su esposo con los gastos del hogar se dedica a la venta de ropa por catalogo y productos de Yanbal (productos de belleza, cosméticos, perfumería y accesorios para damas). Su forma de venta es puerta a puerta, deja sus productos a crédito y cobra cada semana. Tiene más de 6  años que se dedica a esta actividad y le va muy bien.

Este crédito es para comprar perfumes, cremas, cosméticos y ropa. Este es el segundo ciclo en el Banco Comunal y le gusta porque los créditos le ayudan mucho. 

Su sueño es darles lo mejor a  sus hijos.
texts.en:
Communal bank “La Negrita” meets every fortnight in the Montecristi canton, which is famous for its rich pre-colonial culture and its nationwide and worldwide recognized crafts. This is where the famous toquilla straw hats [panama hats] are made.

Mrs. Norma lives here, she is 20 and lives in a common-law marriage out of which she has three children that are 4, 3 and 2 years old, respectively. Her partner is a teacher.

She is a housewife that strives to be more independent economically, so she can feel that she is useful and can help her partner with the expenses. She sells clothes by catalogue and Yanbal products (beauty products, cosmetics, perfumes and accessories for women). She sells door-to-door, on credit and she collects weekly. She has been doing this for six years now, and she does very well.

With this loan she will buy perfumes, creams, cosmetics and clothes. This is her second cycle with the communal bank, something she likes because it is of great help.

Her dream is to give her children the best.

loans.use: to buy perfumes, creams, cosmetics and clothes.

loans.name: Rosa Estrella

texts.es:
En la playa de San Jacinto en el Cantón Sucre cada quince días se reúne el Banco Comunal Bankito La Y. Este lugar es conocido por sus hermosas playas que son visitadas por muchos turistas nacionales y extranjeros, ofrece diversidad de lugares hermosos y una rica variedad de platos típicos de la región.

En este lugar vive la señora Rosa, tiene 53 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen cuatro hijos todos mayores de edad e independientes, con ellos viven dos nietos de 12 y 3 años de edad que son como sus hijos ya que los tiene desde que nacieron, el mayor estudia en colegio. Su esposo se dedica a la pesca.

Doña Rosa para obtener sus propios ingresos y con esto ayudar a su esposo con los gastos del hogar se dedica a la venta de materiales de pesca, ella les surte a los pescadores de la zona y su esposo materiales como piolas, hilos, redes, etc.  Lleva más de 15 años con este negocio y le va muy bien.

Este crédito lo va a emplear para comprar piolas, redes y otros materiales de pesca. Esta desde el inicio en el Banco Comunal y le gusta por la ayuda y beneficios que recibe del banco. 

Sus sueños son seguir adelante en su negocio y en su vida familiar.
texts.en:
Every fifteen days the communal bank, Bankito La Y, meets at the San Jacinto beach in Sucre Canton.  This location is known for its beautiful beaches which are visited by many national and foreign tourists.  It offers a diversity of lovely attractions and a rich variety of regional dishes.

This is where Rosa, 53, lives.  She is married and has four adult children who are independent.  Two grandchildren, ages 12 and 3, have lived with her since they were born and are like her own children to her.  The eldest one goes to school.  Her husband is a fisherman.

In order to earn her own income and help her husband cover household expenses, Rosa supplies fishing materials, such as rope, wire, nets, etc., to the fishermen in the area and her husband.  She has been in business for 15 years, and it is going well for her.

This loan will be used to buy rope, nets and other fishing materials.  She has been a member of the communal bank since its beginning, and likes the help and benefits she receives from it.

Her goal is to get ahead in both her business and family life.

loans.use: To buy rope, nets and other fishing materials.

loans.name: Patricia Valentina

texts.es:
En la playa de San Jacinto en el Cantón Sucre cada quince días se reúne el Banco Comunal Bankito La Y. Este lugar es conocido por sus hermosas playas que son visitadas por muchos turistas nacionales y extranjeros, ofrece diversidad de lugares hermosos y una rica variedad de platos típicos de la región.

En este lugar vive la señora Patricia, tiene 26 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen dos hijos de 8 y 4 años que estudian en escuela. Su esposo es chofer.

Doña Patricia para ayudar a su esposo con los gastos del hogar se dedica a la venta de ropa de todo tipo, zapatos y sandalias, su forma de  venta es puerta a puerta y también vende en su  casa hasta donde llegan sus clientes más conocidos, los mismos que le realizan muchos pedidos ya que ella trae mercadería de muy buena calidad y en modelos novedosos. Trabaja de tres a cuatro días por semana y en  los momentos que está desocupada, deja a crédito y cobra cada quince días. Su mercadería  la va a comprar a  Guayaquil cada vez que necesita. Tiene dos años que se dedica a esta actividad y le va muy bien.

Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar zapatos y ropa de todo tipo. Está en el Banco Comunal desde hace 2 años y le gusta porque con el primer crédito empezó su negocio.
 
Su sueño es tener su casa propia ya que donde vive es arrendado.
texts.en:
The community bank Bankito La Y meets every 15 days at San Jacinto beach in Sucre Canton. The area is known for its beautiful beaches which are visited by domestic and foreign tourists alike. It has many beautiful spots and a delicious variety of cuisine typical to the region. 

This is where Patricia lives. She is 26 years old, married and has two children ages 8 and 4, who are in school. Her husband is a driver. 

To help her husband with household expenses, Patricia has a business selling clothing, shoes and sandals. She sells door to door and also from her home. Her best clients come to her home and make large orders from her because they know she always offers good, quality merchandise and the latest fashions. Patricia works 3 or 4 days a week and whenever she has free time. She offers credit and charges her customers every 15 days. She goes to Guayaquil to buy merchandise whenever she needs it. She has been running her business for 2 years and it has been going well. 

Patricia will use the current loan to buy all types of clothes and shoes. She has been a member of the community bank for 2 years and she likes it because her first loan allowed her to start her business. Her dream is to own her own home because she currently lives in a rental.

loans.use: to buy clothes and shoes to sell

loans.name: Angela Catalina

texts.es:
En la playa de San Jacinto en el Cantón Sucre cada quince días se reúne el Banco Comunal Bankito La Y. Este lugar es conocido por sus hermosas playas que son visitadas por muchos turistas nacionales y extranjeros, ofrece diversidad de lugares hermosos y una rica variedad de platos típicos de la región.

En este lugar vive la señora Angela, tiene 30 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene cuatro hijos de 15, 13, 10 y 4 años, los dos mayores estudian en colegio y los menores en escuela. El marido se dedica a la pesca.
 
Ella utiliza el crédito para ayudar a su esposo ya que él requiere de materiales para realizar una buena pesca, necesita comprar redes, piolas, combustible y alimentos para los días que están en alta mar. Su esposo junto a dos personas más se embarcan en la lancha y regresan a los dos o tres días dependiendo de lo hayan pescado,  descansan uno o dos días y vuelven a su labor, él lleva más de 8 años dedicado a la pesca.

Este crédito lo va a emplear para comprar piolas, redes y varios materiales de pesca. Este es su primer ciclo en el Banco Comunal y le gusta porque el crédito fue rápido sin tantos requisitos.
 
Su sueño es que siempre le vaya bien a su esposo.
texts.en:
The Community Bank La Y meets every 15 days at San Jacinto beach in Sucre Canton. The area is known for it's beautiful beaches, which are visited by domestic and foreign tourists alike. It has many beautiful spots and a delicious variety of dishes that are typical to the region. 

This is where Angela lives. She is 30 years old, in a relationship and has four children ages15, 13, 10 and 4 years old The oldest two are in high school and the youngest two are in primary school. Her husband is a fisherman. 

Angela will use the loan to help her husband because he needs certain materials to be successful at fishing. He needs nets, rope, fuel and food for the days that he is out to sea. Her husband and two other men go out in a boat and return 2 or 3 days later depending on what they have caught. They rest for 1 or 2 days and then go back to sea. Angela's husband has been working as a fisherman for 8 years. 

Angela will use the loan to buy rope, nets and other fishing materials. This is her first experience with the community bank and she likes it because she was able to receive the loan quickly without a lot of requirements. 

Her dream is for her husband to be successful.

loans.use: to buy rope, nets and other materials for fishing.

loans.name: Deysy Angela

texts.es:
En la playa de San Jacinto en el Cantón Sucre cada quince días se reúne el Banco Comunal Bankito La Y. Este lugar es conocido por sus hermosas playas que son visitadas por muchos turistas nacionales y extranjeros, ofrece diversidad de lugares hermosos y una rica variedad de platos típicos de la región.

En este lugar vive la señora Deysy, tiene 36 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen dos hijos de  18 y 16 años los mismos que  estudian en colegio. Su esposo se dedica al negocio familiar.

Ella junto a su esposo tienen un restaurante en su casa el cual está a la sorillas de las playas de San Jacinto, todos los días llegan muchas personas a comer en su local ya que allí preparan deliciosos platos, trabaja todos los días todo el día ya prepara desayunos, almuerzos, meriendas y platos a la carta, su especialidad son los mariscos ya que estos son los más solicitados por sus clientes, con ellos  trabaja una persona a quien le paga un sueldo semanal por su trabajo.  Tienen 10 años con su restaurante y siempre les ha ido muy bien.

Este crédito lo va utilizar en comprar arroz, carne, pescado y otros víveres para la preparación de los alimentos. Está en el Banco Comunal desde hace cinco ciclos y le gusta porque con los créditos ha podido salir adelante.
 
Su meta es darles la mejor educación a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Every fifteen days the communal bank, Bankito La Y, meets at the San Jacinto beach in Sucre Canton. This location is known for its beautiful beaches which are visited by many national and foreign tourists.  It offers a diversity of lovely attractions and a rich variety of regional dishes.

This is where Deysy lives.  She is 36, married and has two children, ages 18 and 16, who attend school.  Her husband runs the family business.

She and her husband have a restaurant at their home which is located on the shore of the San Jacinto beach.  Every day many people are attracted to the restaurant's delicious food.  Deysy works daily preparing breakfast, lunch, afternoon tea and menu items.  Her specialty is seafood, the most popular dish among her customers.  They have a paid employee who earns a weekly salary.  The restaurant has been in business for ten years, and it has always gone well.

This loan will be used to buy rice, meat, fish and other groceries to make meals.  She has been in the communal bank for five loan periods, and is happy that the loans have helped her geat ahead.

Her goal is to give her children a better education.

loans.use: To buy rice, meat, fish and other groceries.

loans.name: Noelia Beatriz

texts.es:
NOELIA BEATRIZ 
Doña Noelia de 34 años de edad, comerciante  desde hace 5 años,  actualmente cuenta en su domicilio con una venta de consumo diario  ofreciéndole a su clientela productos  como gaseosas, azúcar, maíz, frijol, cereales, verduras, recargas electrónicas,  también tiene a la  venta  pollo destazado, venta de medicina, venta de leña, y venta de gas propano el cual inicio hace algunos meses, doña Noelia cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo y el poder ofrecer a su clientela todos estos servicios hace que mucha gente la visita por que en su negocio encuentra lo que busca, su meta  ahora es seguir ayudando a su hija mayor quien este año ingreso a la carrera de nivel medio, es por ello que desea seguir surtiendo su tienda ya que sabe que su capital es seguro y que la administración del mismo le genera su ganancia y el pago del crédito, solicita esta crédito para la compra de productos comestibles de primera necesidad.
texts.en:
Noelia is 34 years old and has been an entrepreneur for 5 years. She currently has a store in her home where she sells daily items like sodas, sugar, corn, beans, grains, vegetables and electronic refills. She also sells cut-up chicken, medicine, firewood and propane gas, which she just began offering a few months ago. Noelia's husband helps her out and being able to offer so many products means that people always find what they need when they come to her. 

Her goal is to continue helping her oldest daughter who just started high school. That's why she wants to continue with her store since she knows her capital is safe there and the administration of it will generate income and the ability to repay her loan. She will use the loan to buy staple food products for her store.

loans.use: to purchase staple food products for her store.

loans.name: Dúo Elohim Group

texts.es: Dúo Elohim Doña Elvira de 38 años de edad vive en el municipio de  San  Juan Sacatepequez desde hace varios años, doña Elvira como representante de  este dúo, se dedica actualmente a la venta de artículos por catalogo, lo que son perfumería, cosméticos, artículos  de limpieza,  utensilio de cocina, este negocio le ha parecido muy bien ya que ella puede dedicarle tiempo  a su familia y estar al pendiente de sus ventas también, sus hijos  le ayudan promocionando los artículos en el colegio o amistades, ella sale de manera ambulante en las localidades más cercanas de su domicilio,está solicitando este crédito para la compra de cosmeticos y productos de limpiesa.
texts.en: Elvira is 38 years old and has lived in San Juan Sacatepequez for many years. She works selling items from a catalog, like perfume, cosmetics, cleaning products and cooking utensils. This business has worked very well for her because she can take care of her family and make sales at the same time. Her children help her by promoting the products at school or among their friends. She also goes walking around the towns close to her home in order to make sales. She is requesting the loan in order to buy cosmetics and cleaning products.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics and cleaning products.

loans.name: Augustine

texts.fr: Agée de 38ans, Augustine est mariée et mère de six enfants scolarisés. Le plus âgé et le moins âgé ont respectivement 19ans et 04ans. Augustine commercialise des ustensiles de cuisine et de divers depuis quelques années puis s'approvisionne dans l'un des marchés du Bénin. Dans le souci d'augmenter son chiffre d'affaire et de combler les attentes de ses clients, elle a sollicité et a obtenu un financement auprès de Finadev en vue de maximiser ses intérêts et de participer à l'éducation de ses enfants.
texts.en: Augustine, who is 38 years old, is married and mother to six children, who are all at school. The eldest is 19 years old and the youngest four. Augustine has been selling kitchen utensils and various other products for several years and gets her supplies in one of Benin's markets. With a view to increasing her turnover and meeting her customers' expectations, she has requested and been granted a loan from Finadev so that she can maximise her interest and contribute to her children's education.

loans.use: to buy three cartons of sugar, five cartons of soaps and 25 saucepans.

loans.name: Diana Mariuxi

texts.es:
En la playa de San Jacinto en el Cantón Sucre cada quince días se reúne el Banco Comunal Bankito La Y. Este lugar es conocido por sus hermosas playas que son visitadas por muchos turistas nacionales y extranjeros, ofrece diversidad de lugares hermosos y una rica variedad de platos típicos de la región.

En este lugar vive la señora Diana, tiene 30 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene dos hijos de 9 y 5  años de edad, los mismos que estudian en escuela. El marido es pescador.
 
Ella es una ama de casa para obtener sus propios recursos y con estos ayudar a  sus hijos con los gasto de los estudios de sus hijos se dedica al comercio, vende ropa y su forma de venta es puerta a puerta, también vende mariscos en su casa, trabaja 4 días a la semana sobre todo por las mañanas aprovechando que sus hijos están en la escuela, ella deja a crédito y cobra los fines de semana. Su mercadería la compra en Portoviejo.

Este crédito es para comprar ropa y mariscos. Esta desde el inicio  en el Banco Comunal y le gusta por la rapidez para conseguir los créditos. 

Su sueño es tener un local comercial.
texts.en:
Every fifteen days the communal bank, Bankito La Y, meets at the San Jacinto beach in Sucre Canton. This location is known for its beautiful beaches which are visited by many national and foreign tourists. It offers a diversity of lovely attractions and a rich variety of regional dishes.

This is where Diana lives.  She is 30 and has two children, ages 9 and 5, who attend school.  Her common-law husband is a fisherman.

She is a homemaker who earns her own income selling clothing door-to-door to help cover her children's education costs.  She also sells seafood from home and works four mornings a week while her children are at school.  Her sales are transacted on a credit basis and payment is collected on weekends.   She buys merchandise in Portoviejo.

This loan is to buy clothing and seafood.  Diana has been in the communal bank since its beginning; and she likes the fact that loans are granted quickly.

Her goal is to have her own shop one day.

loans.use: To buy clothing and seafood.

loans.name: María Elena

texts.es:
En la playa de San Jacinto en el Cantón Sucre cada quince días se reúne el Banco Comunal Bankito La Y. Este lugar es conocido por sus hermosas playas que son visitadas por muchos turistas nacionales y extranjeros, ofrece diversidad de lugares hermosos y una rica variedad de platos típicos de la región.

Aquí vive la señora María, tiene 41 años de edad, es madre soltera de una hija de 16 años que estudian en colegio. Ella vive sola con su hija. Lleva tres ciclos  en el Banco Comunal y le gusta porque los créditos le son de gran ayuda.

Doña María es una muy buena madre que para obtener sus propios recursos y con esto sacar adelante a su hija se dedica a la venta de mariscos, todos los días en las mañanas ella se desplaza hasta las playas del lugar a esperar que lleguen los pescadores para comprarles los productos del mar para luego venderlos a los distintos comerciantes que llegan al lugar para llevarlos a otras ciudades, lleva más de cinco años que se dedica a esta actividad y gracias a esto está sacando adelante sola a su hija.
 
Este crédito es para comprar todo tipo de mariscos.
  
Su sueño es darle la mejor educación  a su hija.
texts.en:
Every fifteen days the communal bank, Bankito La Y, meets at the San Jacinto beach in Sucre Canton. This location is known for its beautiful beaches which are visited by many national and foreign tourists. It offers a diversity of lovely attractions and a rich variety of regional dishes.

This is where María, 41, lives.  She is a single mother of a 16-year-old daughter who attends school, and they live alone together.  She has been in the communal bank for three loan cycles and likes it because the loans have been very helpful.

María is a very good mother who earns a living by selling seafood in order to provide for her daughter.  Every morning she goes down to the beach to wait for the fishermen so she can buy seafood that she later sells to the different merchants who come from other cities.  She has been in business for over five years, thanks to which she has been able to raise her daughter by herself.

This loan will be used to buy all kinds of seafood.

Her dream is to give her daughter the best education possible.

loans.use: To buy seafood.

loans.name: Camino Al Exito Group

texts.es: Buenas Días!!  Este es el grupo “Camino Al Éxito” conformado por 11 socios, la cual pasan a su 3er ciclo.  Constantina es  una de las  socias activa, tiene 33 años de edad casada con 02 hijos en etapa escolar. Constantina se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza, la cual lo realiza a pedidos, también nos comenta que hace un año inicio un nuevo negocio de la venta de pan, generando así un ingreso extra para su hogar. Estas actividades le han permitido apoyar a su esposo con los gastos del hogar. El crédito que recibió lo destinará para la compra de talcos, perfumes, cremas y desodorantes para poder ofrecer a sus clientes. Terminar de construir su vivienda es su mayor deseo, pues luego piensa poner una tienda donde pueda ofrecer sus productos de belleza.   Constantina se encuentra sentada viste polo rosado. Agradece a los prestamistas Kiva por la ayuda brindada.
texts.en:
Good morning! This is the group “Camino al éxito” [Road to success], composed of eleven members. They are now in their third cycle.

Constantina is an active member; she is 33, married and has two children that attend school. Constantina sells beauty products on demand, and a year ago she started a new business: selling bread. This has meant an extra income for her family. With these activities, she has been able to help her husband with the household expenses. 

She will use the loan she was granted to buy talcum powder, perfumes, creams and deodorants for her customers. Her biggest dream is to finish building her house, where she plans to start a store to sell her beauty products.

In the picture, Constantina is the woman wearing a pink t-shirt. She appreciates the help given by Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to buy talcum powder, perfumes, creams and deodorants.

loans.name: Ablavi Gisèle's Group

texts.fr: Il s'agit d'un groupe composé de deux femmes en caution solidaire. Gisèle la responsable est âgée de 37ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 04enfants scolarisés. L'aîné et le benjamin ont respectivement 13ans et 07ans. Gisèle vend des boîtes de conserve, de l'huile, des macaronis et de divers depuis quelques années puis s'approvisionne dans l'un des marchés du Bénin. Dans le but d'augmenter son capital et de répondre favorablement à la demande de ses clients, elle a sollicité et a obtenu un micro crédit à Finadev. Ce crédit lui permettra de maximiser profit afin de participer à la scolarisation de ses enfants et d'aider son mari à achever la construction de leur maison. Gisèle se retrouve à gauche dans la photo.
texts.en: This is a group of two women who have joint liability. Gisèle who is responsible for the group is 37 years old. She is married and mother to four children, who attend school. The eldest is 13 years old and the youngest seven. Gisèle has been selling canned foods, oil, macaroni and other products for several years and gets her supplies in one of Benin's markets. With a view to increasing her capital and responding favorably to customer demand, she has requested and been granted a micro-loan from Finadev. This loan will enable her to maximise her profit so that she can contribute to her children's education and help her husband with the building of their house. Gisèle is on the left of the photo.

loans.use: to buy 25 hair extensions, a carton of sugar and a carton of soaps.

loans.name: Noudehouenou Mireille's Group

texts.fr: Il s'agit d'un groupe composé de deux membres en caution solidaire. Mireille la responsable est âgée de 26ans. Elle est mariée et mère de deux enfants âgés respectivement de 4ans et un mois. Spécialisée dans la vente des boîtes de conserve, de macaroni, de la farine de manioc, elle a aussi une poissonnerie où elle vend des poissons depuis deux ans. En vue de renforcer son fonds de roulement et de satisfaire les exigences de ses clients, elle a sollicité et a obtenu un financement à Finadev. Le bénéfice généré par ce financement lui permettra de renforcer son commerce et de participer aux dépenses du foyer. Mireille se retrouve à gauche dans la photo.
texts.en: This is a group of two people who have joint liability. Mireille who is responsible for the group is 26 years old. She is married and mother to two children, who are four years old and one month old respectively. She is specialised in the sale of canned foods, macaroni and cassava flour, but she also has a fishmonger's shop where she has been selling fish for the past two years. With a view to increasing her working capital and satisfying customer demand, she has requested and been granted a loan from Finadev. This loan will enable her to boost her business and contribute to the household expenses. Mireille is on the left of the photo.

loans.use: to buy ten cartons of fish and five cartons of cubes.

loans.name: Anita María

texts.es:
En la playa de San Jacinto en el Cantón Sucre cada quince días se reúne el Banco Comunal Bankito La Y. Este lugar es conocido por sus hermosas playas que son visitadas por muchos turistas nacionales y extranjeros, ofrece diversidad de lugares hermosos y una rica variedad de platos típicos de la región.

En este lugar vive la señora Anita, tiene 38 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijas  de 14, 11 y 9 años las mismas que estudian la mayor en colegio y las menores en escuela. Su esposo se dedica a la pesca y además es chofer.

Doña Anita  tiene una tienda en su casa allí vende todo tipo de productos de primera necesidad  como arroz, azúcar, aceites, detergentes, entre otras cosas, en la actualidad espera utilizar el crédito para comprar ciertos artículos de bazar para vender también estos productos en su tienda, trabaja todos los días desde las 6h00 hasta las 21h00 y a veces hasta más tarde, allí también vende deliciosos helados que ella prepara y que son de mucho agrado de sus clientes,  lleva en este negocio por más de 5 años y  desde que está recibiendo los créditos se le ha hecho más fácil poder surtir su local.
 
Este crédito lo va a emplear en surtir mas su tienda, va a comprar arroz, azúcar, aceite, detergentes, artículos de bazar y otros víveres. Esta desde el inicio  en el Banco Comunal, es la tesorera del grupo  y le gusta porque el grupo es muy responsable.
 
Sus sueños es seguir adelante y darles lo mejor as sus hijas.
texts.en:
Every fifteen days the communal bank, Bankito La Y, meets at the San Jacinto beach in Sucre Canton. This location is known for its beautiful beaches which are visited by many national and foreign tourists. It offers a diversity of lovely attractions and a rich variety of regional dishes.

This is where Anita, 38, lives with her husband and three school-aged daughters, ages 14, 11 and 9.  Her husband is a fisherman and also a driver.  

Anita runs a grocery store out of her home and sells all kinds of essential goods such as rice, sugar, oils, detergents, and other items.  She hopes to receive a loan to buy certain bazaar articles to sell at her store as well.  She works every day from 6:00 a.m. to 9:00 p.m. and sometimes even later.  She also sells home-made ice cream that is very popular among her customers.  She has been in business for over five years and claims to be able to stock her store easier thanks to the loans.

This loan will be used to stock the store with rice, sugar, oil, detergents, bazaar items and other groceries.  She has been in the communal bank since the beginning and is the activing treasurer of the group.  She likes the fact that the members are very responsible.

Her dream is to get ahead and giver her daughters the best she can.

loans.use: To buy rice, sugar, oil, detergents, bazaar items and groceries.

loans.name: Vencedoras Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “VENCEDORAS”  iniciará el primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal Juan Pablo II, está compuesta por once integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Aurora es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: tejido de ropa de bebe, tienda de barrio, tejido de mantas, tejido de chompas, venta de muebles usados, venta de comida, venta de chatarras, albañil.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Aurora es integrante, ella indica que es la primera vez que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por invitación de unas amigas que son socias de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de confección de chompas; cuenta que esta técnica de tejido lo aprendió sola y emprendió su negocio por iniciativa propia.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de lana) que adquirirá de las personas que venden por mayor y posteriormente a la elaboración lo comercializará en su puesto de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar económicamente a su familia pues ella es esta casada y tiene tres hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el área de salud y los ahorros que ofrece nuestra institución.
texts.en:
The “VENCEDORAS” communal bank wiill begin its first cycle in Pro Mujer, as a part of the Juan Pablo II center. It is made up of eleven members and is led by a board of directors of which Aurora is the president. The businesses that the members of the association have are varied. Among them are: knitting baby clothes, a neighborhood store, knitting blankets, knitting sweaters, selling used furniture, selling food, selling scrap and bricklaying.

The loan they will take out will beneifit these small businesswomen. Aurora is a member, and she indictaes that this is the first time she has been in Pro Mujer. She entered at the invitation of some friends who are members of the institution. Right now, she has a business making sweaters. She says she learned the technique on her own and started her business on her own intitative.
 
The loan she will take out now is to increase her capital by buying wool. She will acquire it from people who sell it wholesale and after making her products she will sell them at her sales stall. This work lets her generate income to support her family financially, because she is married and has three children. When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she says that she likes the health and saving trainings that our institution offers.

loans.use: to buy wool

loans.name: Safiatou

texts.fr:
Madame SAFIATOU  est âgée de 22 ans,  mariée et mère de 2 enfants. Elle vit chez son mari dans une famille traditionnelle au quartier Heremakono Nord de Bougouni.
C’est après son mariage, qu’elle commença à faire le petit commerce de vêtements, de pagnes et de parures. Nantie de 5 ans d’expérience elle jouit d’une grande réputation. Sa force de vente est due à son prix abordable mais surtout à son sens élevé du commerce.  
Dans le but d’augmenter son fonds de commerce pour satisfaire la  demande de la clientèle, elle fait recours au crédit de Soro Yiriwaso avec qui elle est à son 1er prêt individuel qu’elle compte utiliser pour acheter, 10 pièces de pagnes wax et 1 rouleau de pagne brodé. Elle   s’approvisionne à Bamako auprès des grossistes. 
Madame SAFIATOU vend au comptant et à crédit à une clientèle composée majoritairement de femmes, au marché et à domicile. 
Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice mensuel de 40 000 FCFA, qui serait  utilisé pour aider son mari à subvenir aux dépenses de la famille et réinvestir dans ses activités. Son ambition est de  devenir grossiste dans son activité.
texts.en:
Safiatou is 22 years old, married and mother to two children. She lives with her husband in a traditional family in the Heremakono Nord district of Bougouni. 

After her marriage she began a small business selling clothes, "pagnes" (pieces of colorful fabric) and linen sets. With five years' experience she now enjoys a significant reputation. Her sales strength is her affordable prices but also her good business sense. 

With a view to boosting her business and satisfy customer demand, she is turning to Soro Yiriwaso, and is on her first individual loan with the institution. She plans to use her loan to buy 10 "pagnes wax" (highly decorative pieces of colorful fabric) and one roll of embroidered "pagne".  She gets her supplies from wholesalers in Bamako. 

Safiatou sells for cash and on credit, to a customer base made up primarily of women, at the market and from home. She expects to make a monthly profit of 40,000FCFA, which will be used to help her husband with the family expenses and to reinvest in her business. Her ambition is to become a wholesaler in this business.

loans.use: to buy "pagnes".

loans.name: Adiccion Group

texts.es:
