Decidió intensificar esta actividad sembrando principalmente  la papa, maíz, habas, trigo, cebada y pastizales para que consuma su ganado en diferentes terrenos de cultivo. En la actualidad sigue cultivando y le generan las ganancias necesarias para seguir adelante. Además de poseer vacas, a las que le saca mucho provecho, ya que realiza queso con la leche que produce, según cuenta cada mañana en cuestión de horas, se termina los moldes que prepara, ya que los profesores y enfermeras son sus principales clientes. Con su familia se ha propuesto mejorar cada año y superar su producción ganadera y agrícola, ya que su secreto es comercializar los alimentos a la capital del país, en donde cada vez la competencia en muy fuerte. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “productoras agrícolas las emprendedoras” y este es el sexto crédito con MFP, agradece el apoyo financiero que le otorgan de manera constante. Ahora tiene el medio para mejorar su negocio. Promete ser puntual con sus cuotas, ya que le enseñaron a ser responsable. Lourdes, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de varios sacos de abono orgánico para distribuir entre sus sembríos.
texts.en:
Lourdes, age 46, is a hardworking woman. She lives with her two daughters, Hely and Emili, and cares for them in her own home. Lourdes has spent her entire life around farming and ranching, and now it is the means by which she is able to generate income. When she and her husband started their family 20 years ago, they decided to intensify their farming activity by growing mostly potatoes, corn, beans, wheat, barley, and fodder for their cows that roam on different plots of land. At the moment, Lourdes continues to farm and is able to generate the necessary income to move forward. She also owns cows and takes full advantage of them by making cheese from the milk that they produce. Lourdes says that every morning, she is able to finish producing cheese molds within a matter of hours. Her main customers are teachers and nurses. Along with her family, she proposes to improve each year and exceed their previous livestock and farming production. Her secret is to sell her products in the capital, where the level of competition gets stronger each time.

Lourdes is a member of the solidarity group “Productoras Agrícolas Las Emprendedoras”. This is her sixth loan with MFP and she is grateful for the financial support that has been provided to her in a constant manner. She now has the means to improve her business and promises to be punctual with her payments, thus demonstrating that she will be responsible. Lourdes will invest the money she requested in the purchase of several sacks of organic compost that she can distribute among her crops.

loans.use: to buy sacks of organic compost.

loans.name: Mwajuma

texts.en: Mwajuma is a 23-year-old married mother of two children who are in school. She has a fruit and vegetable stand that she runs out of her home.  She started her business 3 years ago; thanks to it, she has been able to achieve good results. With this loan she will buy a larger quantity of fruits and vegetables such as watermelons, oranges, bananas, cabbages, kale, etc. This will allow her to earn more and to continue supporting her family and cover her children's educational expenses.

loans.use: to buy more fruits and vegetables to sell

loans.name: David

texts.en: David is 27 years old, married, and has no children yet. He lives in the Shimoni neighborhood in the town of Msambweni, Kenya. He has a small business selling fish, and his wife works as a tailor in the same neighborhood. Both of them are devoted to their work so as to achieve a better future for themselves and for their anticipated children. David will invest his loan in buying more fish to increase his stock.  His goal is to grow his business and soon he plans to open a retail shop so that he can continue supporting his partner. This is his first loan cycle with Yehu.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy a new sewing machine as well as some clothes

loans.name: Jose Orlando

texts.es: José tiene 30 años de edad está casado vive en la ciudad de  Quevedo  provincia de los Ríos. Tiene 3 hijos que asisten a una escuela cercana a su vivienda. José desde pequeño siempre le ha gustado el trabajo del campo.  Años  atrás recibió un seminario  para cultivar hortalizas.  Ahora trabaja cultivando hortalizas y plantas medicinales, con la ayuda de su esposa junto salen a trabajar a las 5 de la mañana hasta las 4 de la tarde. Con el préstamo quiere comprar semillas, fertilizantes etc. Su meta es de terminar su casa y tener más terreno para su negocio de cultivo
texts.en:
José is 30 years old, married, and lives in the city of Quevedo in Los Ríos Province. He has three children who attend a school near his home. From a very young age, José has always enjoyed working in the fields. Years later, he took a seminar on how to grow vegetables. Now he is growing vegetables and medicinal plants with the help of his wife. They work together from 5 A.M. to 4 P.M.

With this loan, José will buy seeds, fertilizers, and other supplies. His goal is to finish his house and to have more land for his farming business.

loans.use: to buy buy seeds, fertilizers, and other supplies.
